exporter.name: Static R Exporter
exporter.description: Export data as a static dataset in a format that can be used with the R environment

exporter.name: Dynamic R Exporter
exporter.description: Generate a code snippet that can be used from the R environment to query the database in runtime

exporter.name: Static Python Exporter
exporter.description: Export data as a static dataset in a format that can be used with Python

exporter.name: Dynamic Python Exporter
exporter.description: Generate a code snippet that can be used from Python to query the database in runtime
